name: distribution_capabilities
schema:
CREATE TABLE `distribution_capabilities` (
	`distribution_id` text NOT NULL,
	`capability_id` text NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY(`distribution_id`, `capability_id`),
	FOREIGN KEY (`distribution_id`) REFERENCES `distributions`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade,
	FOREIGN KEY (`capability_id`) REFERENCES `capabilities`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE cascade
)
